overview: Jimmy Fitzgerald is COO at SignalDemand. As a member of the company’s executive team, Mr. Fitzgerald is responsible for driving company operations. Prior to SignalDemand, Mr. Fitzgerald was responsible for all customer management functions across Oracle Customer Services on a global basis. His background also includes global services leadership roles at Siebel Systems in addition to leadership positions in both the EMEA and Asia Pacific divisions. Prior to joining Siebel Systems, Mr. Fitzgerald held management positions at Shell, IBM Consulting, and Andersen Consulting. Mr. Fitzgerald received a business degree from University College Cork and an MBA from Helsinki School of Economics.
